text: ذُوقُوا۟ فِتْنَتَكُمْ هَـٰذَا ٱلَّذِى كُنتُم بِهِۦ تَسْتَعْجِلُونَ

translation.en.sahih: [And will be told], "Taste your torment. This is that for which you were impatient."
translation.id.indonesian: (Dikatakan kepada mereka): "Rasakanlah azabmu itu. Inilah azab yang dulu kamu minta untuk disegerakan".
